chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 has a problem:
They haven't delivered the package and it says it's been delivered. What do I do now?

Thank you,

Hi there,


The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID.

Please send us a Proof of Delivery (POD) with the customer's signature, or a photo of the package being handed to the customer, within 48 hours. 

Please note: a POD without a signature will not be considered relevant.

- If POD is provided, a police report will be required from the customer to process the claim.
- If no POD is provided within 2 business days: only ID + Certificate of Non-receipt will be required.

If the package is lost and the customer has provided all the necessary paperwork they can choose between a refund or a reshipment. In this case, we recommend that you block the device, if possible.

In case the order is not found and the customer chooses a replacement, are you able to send one?

If not, we'll handle the refund.

Thanks for your help.

Looking forward to hearing from you,
Denisse, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

Kindly assist the customer in preparing a handwritten CND with the IMEI of the device and their ID. We will check with our logistics partner. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

The parcel was delivered to a UPS Access Point at the following address:

MARITXU GOZOKIAK , 2 MURUETATORRE AUZUNEA GRUP , DURANGO , 48200 , ES

Regards,
RK

Hi there,

The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID, ---- ONLY IF THE ORDER IS AN IPHONE 12/13/14 (to remove) --- along with a proof of address.

Hi ecomobile

Please note that the deadline to refund the customer for this item has been reached. 

On the customer side, all the necessary documents have been provided, and there have been no new updates to the tracking information.

Please note that in order to open a support case for you with the BackShip team, we still need you to share the following documents with us: Proof of Delivery (POD)

Once you have the paperwork ready, please send them as attachments here, and I will transfer them to the BackShip team. This is necessary for the shipping provider investigation to be processed and for you to get compensated.

Please note that after 30 days from the shipping date, the case will be outdated and we won't be able to compensate you.

Please note that this claim will be closed automatically after 7 days if you don't respond.

Feel free to reach out with any questions.

Paola, Back Market Customer Care

Dear Backcare,

I have requested a POD from my logistics partner. In the meantime, if the customer claims that the parcel is not at the pickup point, please assist them in furnishing a handwritten CND with the IMEI included.

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

Client has provided all the documents, we are just waiting for you to give us the POD.

Regards.
Paola from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Attached is the POD. 

Unfortunately the CND is not valid as it is not handwritten. Kindly ask the customer to print out the template and fill it up by hand. Please also include the IMEI of the phone which should be 355818451165498. 

Regards,
RK

Hello!

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

The POD isn't validated because this no has a firm of the customer.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

This order will be refunded in 24 hours 

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Best regards,
Luisa - Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Can I clarify what you mean by the POD is not validated? Also can I confirm that the customer does not have the parcel? 

Regards,
RK

Dear ecomobile

The POD isn't validated because this no has a signature of the customer.

The parcel has not been successfully delivered yet and all the requirements for a refund as described by our lost parcel policy have been fulfilled. Any and all relevant paperwork has been attached to this message.

The POD isn't validated because this no has a signature of the customer.

You can use the attached documents to investigate the matter with your delivery company

This order will be refunded in 24 hours

Please send a tracking link for a replacement within 24 hours or this order will be refunded

You can now blacklist the device.

Regards,
Luisa from the Back Care Team

Dear ecomobile

You communicate again with Luisa, Back Market agent. I hope you are well and having a wonderful day. It is a pleasure for me to communicate with you again. 

Thank you for your prompt response and update.I wanted to tell you that we refunded the customer because there was no response from you according to the stipulated time periods. If you have any questions or concerns, you can contact SSC.

I appreciate your help and commitment to this case.

For me, It's a pleasure to help!

Have a very good day ecomobile!
Luisa from the Back Care Team
